channel.title: CVE Feed for PickPlugins -- PickPlugins Product Slider for WooCommerce
channel.description: The latest CVEs for PickPlugins -- PickPlugins Product Slider for WooCommerce

item.title: CVE-2021-24300|2024-08-03T19:28:23.414Z -- pickplugins -- pickplugins%20product%20slider%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: The slider import search feature of the PickPlugins Product Slider for WooCommerce WordPress plugin before 1.13.22 did not properly sanitised the keyword GET parameter, leading to reflected Cross-Site Scripting issue
